data.title: Emagine Entertainment
data.text:
You can now text us at (248) 965-0904.

We are available from 12pm to 8pm daily.

This is just for Emagine Royal Oak.

NEW to Emagine Royal Oak, the Caesars Sportsbook Lounge Powered by Emagine.

The Caesars Sportsbook Lounge Powered by Emagine brings a full Vegas-style experience while hosting exciting fan engagement events and offer unique promotions to movie and sports fans in the new premium venue. Now showing the biggest games of the day in professional and college sports. Admission is free and available on a first-come, first-served basis for individuals 21 years and older. Click here to see promotions and what’s playing.

3D

RealD 3D is the new generation of entertainment, with crisp, bright, ultra realistic images so lifelike you feel like you’ve stepped inside the movie. RealD 3D adds depth that puts you in the thick of the action, whether you’re taking a voyage through an undiscovered land or dodging objects that seem to fly into the theatre. Don’t just watch a movie, experience a new dimension of entertainment with RealD 3D.

Caesars Sportsbook Lounge Powered by Emagine

The Caesars Sportsbook Lounge Powered by Emagine brings a full Vegas-style experience while hosting exciting fan engagement events and offer unique promotions to movie and sports fans in the new premium venue. Now showing the biggest games of the day in professional and college sports. Admission is free and available on a first-come, first-served basis for individuals 21 years and older.

Reserved Seating

We offer reserved seating at our theatres so that you always get the seat you want. Purchase tickets at the box office, online or on our mobile app on Google Play or iOS App Store and choose the seat you want ahead of time!

Free and Pre-Paid Parking

Structure parking can be paid for at the kiosk located inside Emagine next to the front doors or when exiting the structure. Surface lot parking can only be paid at the outdoor kiosks and you must remember your space number in order to pay.

More Information

Enhanced Concessions

Grab your favorite concession snack like some classic buttered popcorn or candy. For those with a bigger appetite, try one of stone-fired pizzas, hot dogs or soft pretzel bites. (Items may vary by location)

More Information

Gourmet Popcorn

Sure, we offer regular popcorn but you can enjoy cheddar and caramel popcorn too. If you are looking for a healthier option with just as much flavor, try OlivEpop, a special blend of 100% Extra Virgin Olive Oil and dressed with sea salt. *popcorn selections not available at all locations

More Information
